Set(Previous_Bullet_Source ${Bullet_Source})

AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3BulletFile.cpp)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3BulletFile.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3Chunk.cpp)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3Chunk.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3Common.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3Defines.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3DNA.cpp)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3DNA.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3File.cpp)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3File.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3Serializer.cpp)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/b3Serializer.h)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/CMakeLists.txt)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/premake4.lua)
AddFile(Bullet_Source Previous_Bullet_Source Bullet2FileLoader/autogenerated/bullet2.h)

Set(Bullet_Source ${Previous_Bullet_Source} PARENT_SCOPE)
